content: The secret key will be deleted permanently. You will not be able to undo this action.

comment.text: This translation key is used to display a confirmation message when deleting a secret key. It informs users that the action will be permanent and irreversible, typically found in a delete button or modal dialog in UI components.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term "Gizli açar" is a literal translation of "secret key" and while understandable, a more natural phrasing in Azerbaijani might be preferable. "Xüsusi açar" or "Təhlükəli açar" might sound more idiomatic depending on the context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using "Xüsusi açar" or "Təhlükəli açar" instead of "Gizli açar" for better readability and natural language flow.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While "geri qaytara bilməzsiniz" is grammatically correct, a more common and slightly more formal way to express "you will not be able to undo this action" would be "Bu hərəkəti geri qaytara bilməyəcəksiniz".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Use "Bu hərəkəti geri qaytara bilməyəcəksiniz" for a more formal and potentially more common phrasing.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Lao translation contains a space within a word: 'ກະ ທຳ'. It should be joined.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ຄີທີ່ລັບຈະຖືກລົບອອກຢ່າງຖາວອນ ທ່ານຈະບໍ່ສາມາດຍົກເລີກການກະທໍາ ນີ້ໄດ້

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation lacks a punctuation mark (period/full stop) at the end of the sentence.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Sekretny klucz zostanie trwale usunięty. Nie będziesz w stanie cofnąć tego działania.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Portuguese translation uses an ellipsis (...) which is less common and slightly less formal than a full sentence break in this context. It disrupts the flow slightly.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A chave secreta será eliminada permanentemente. Não será possível reverter esta ação.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: “Não poderá anular esta ação” is grammatically correct but a more natural and common phrasing would be 'Não será possível reverter esta ação'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Não será possível reverter esta ação.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'ක්‍රියාව' (kriyaawa) might be too formal for this context. A more natural word for 'action' in this scenario could be 'සිද්ධිය' (siddhiya) or a simpler alternative.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace 'ක්‍රියාව' with 'සිද්ධිය' or a more informal equivalent.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'тајни' is used, which is in the masculine singular form. Secret keys can be plural. While technically correct, using the plural form 'тајних' might be more natural in this context.

The phrase 'This action cannot be undone' is a more natural translation of 'You will not be able to undo this action' than 'Ova radnja se ne može opozvati'. While technically correct, it sounds less conversational and slightly formal.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Tajni ključ će biti trajno obrisan. Ne možete poništiti ovu radnju.
